meanings.definition: Items made of soft materials, such as clothing or linens.
meanings.sent1: I bought some new softgoods at the store today.
meanings.sent2: The store specializes in selling softgoods like cozy blankets and comfortable pajamas.
meanings.sent3: The softgoods in my closet seem to multiply on their own!
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe was a treasure trove of softgoods waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The touch of the softgoods was like a gentle hug for the skin.

meanings.definition: Goods that are easily damaged or worn out.
meanings.sent1: Be careful with those softgoods; they tear easily.
meanings.sent2: The delicate softgoods needed to be handled with care to avoid any damage.
meanings.sent3: The softgoods in the store looked like they had been through a war!
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like softgoods, fragile and easily broken.
meanings.sent5: The softgoods were as delicate as a soap bubble, ready to burst at any moment.
